title: Micheál Martin - Wikipedia
snippet: Born in Cork, Martin initially worked as a teacher before entering politics. He was elected to Cork City Council in 1985, and served as Lord Mayor of Cork from 1992 to 1993. In 1989, he was first elected to Dáil Éireann for Cork South-Central, a seat he has represented ever since.

title: Micheal Martin | Taoiseach, Previous Offices, & Family Tragedy | Britannica
snippet: Micheal Martin, Irish politician who became taoiseach (prime minister) of Ireland in 2020 after the party he led, Fianna Fail, entered into an unprecedented coalition government with its historical rival, Fine Gael, and the Green Party following ...

title: Micheál Martin – Houses of the Oireachtas
snippet: Northern Ireland 3. Deputy Micheál Martin asked the Taoiseach if he has spoken with the First Minister in Northern Ireland recently regarding Covid-19 or other related issues and-or mutual issues which directly impact both jurisdictions.
